metrics.pageDescription: Global DeFi ecosystem metrics compared with MXN stablecoins
metrics.title: Global DeFi vs MXN Stablecoins
metrics.subtitle: Comparison of global Total Value Locked (TVL) in DeFi with Mexican stablecoins
metrics.scaleDescription: Global TVL is approximately {{ratio}}x larger than MXN stablecoins
metrics.scaleNote: The bar represents the real proportion (very small compared to the global market)
metrics.breakdownDescription: TVL distribution among major Mexican stablecoins
metrics.historicalDescription: Evolution of Total Value Locked in DeFi
metrics.aboutDescription: TVL (Total Value Locked) represents the total value of crypto assets deposited in DeFi protocols. This metric is one of the most important indicators for measuring DeFi ecosystem adoption and health.

start.title: MERCADO LP
start.subtitle: Learn DeFi by playing in a Mexican market
start.hintChange: You can switch levels anytime from the top menu
start.hintXP: Complete challenges to earn XP, badges and unlock new tokens

swapper.name: Don Vitalik ¬´El Truequero¬ª
swapper.description: Quiet observer, does mental math and swaps without nerves. Tests small, measures, then scales. Explains complex stuff simply.

provider.name: Don Hayden ¬´El Puestero¬ª
provider.description: Arrives early, sets the stand neatly and keeps the scale ready. Adjusts and rebalances so baskets don't empty unevenly. Works finely without showing off.

creator.name: Do√±a Fabiana ¬´La Semillera¬ª
creator.description: Creative and methodical. Invents names, labels and stories, and launches with a plan: how much fruit, how to split it, and how to start strong.

auctioneer.name: Do√±a Lupe ¬´La Martillera¬ª
auctioneer.description: Shows up when the market is packed. Speaks little, moves fast and plays with time and urgency. Gets ahead and closes before others react.

welcome.title: Welcome to Mercado LP
welcome.description: Think of an automatic stand: there‚Äôs always a price and no intermediaries. Here you see it with fruit‚Äîsimple and not intimidating.
welcome.tip: In a CEX you buy from a market maker, not your friend. Here you see open prices without middlemen.

inventory.title: Your fruit (tokens)
inventory.description: You have pesos as base money and fruit as tokens. You‚Äôll swap between them and see how prices move.
inventory.tip: Each fruit is available liquidity. If you buy too much of one, the basket empties and price goes up.

pools.title: Automatic stands (pools)
pools.description: Each pool has two fruits. The price changes based on how much there is of each. If one gets scarce, price rises.
pools.tip: The pool replaces the order book: the AMM formula always gives you a price even if no buyer is in front.

swap.title: Do your first swap
swap.description: Pick a fruit, set an amount, and see what you get. You‚Äôll notice price impact if the order is big.
swap.action: Try with a small amount to see the change.
swap.tip: If you buy a lot at once, you empty the basket and price climbs. Start small to see real impact.

fees.title: Fees (tips)
fees.description: Every swap pays a small fee to whoever supplied fruit to the pool.
fees.tip: The tip incentivizes someone to keep the stand stocked. Without it, nobody would leave fruit there.

mission.title: Your first mission
mission.description: Complete your first swap. Trade some pesos for fruit and earn XP.
mission.action: Make a swap from pesos to any fruit.
mission.tip: A swap shows price, fee, and change live. Here you practice risk-free and earn XP.

swap.title: N1: Swapper
swap.description: Make your first swap in the market.
swap.help: Pick two fruits, use a small amount, and confirm the swap.

lp.title: N2: Provider
lp.description: Open a stand and supply liquidity to a pool.
lp.help: Select a pair, add similar amounts, and confirm liquidity.

token.title: N3: Token Creator
token.description: Create your own token and open its garden.
token.help: Set name, symbol, and the PESO pair; add initial liquidity and launch.

auction.title: N4: Auctioneer
auction.help: Pick a block, set max price and max spend, and place your bid.

dailyXP.title: Daily XP
dailyXP.capReached: Daily cap reached ({{cap}} XP). Come back tomorrow!

swap.title: Mercado LP - Swaps

errors.missing: Pick a stand, a fruit, and enter an amount greater than 0.
errors.balance: You don't have enough in your bag for this swap.

toasts.first: First swap done! üéâ You used an automatic AMM without intermediaries.
toasts.impact: {{amount}} {{symbol}} ‚Üí ~{{out}} {{outSymbol}}. The x¬∑y=k formula adjusted the price!

priceMood.empty: Enter an amount to see the price

tips: The more you take from the stand, the pricier the next one.
A small tip goes to whoever stocked the stand.
Split big orders to improve price.

banner.title: Level 2: Provider - Add Liquidity
banner.body: Remember the swaps from N1? Now you‚Äôll learn where that fruit comes from. You supply the pool and earn a fee every time someone swaps.
banner.concept: DeFi concept: Liquidity Providing + Fee Earnings + Impermanent Loss

errors.missing: Enter how many fruits of the first type you will add.
errors.noPosition: You have no position in this pool.

toasts.first: First liquidity added! üéâ Now you earn fees on every swap in this pool.
toasts.opened: Stand opened! Now you earn tips. üè™
toasts.closedFees: Stand closed! You earned {{fees}} in tips. üí∞

labels.title: Mercado LP
labels.subtitle: Open stand
labels.needHint: Enter an amount above to see the second token needed.
howList: You add both fruits in the pool ratio.
Every swap in this pool sends you a tip automatically.
You can close your stand anytime and withdraw everything.
labels.tipBody: More swaps in your pool = more tips. Large, active pools usually yield more fees.

modal.title: What is an LP?
modal.body1: LP = Liquidity Provider. You add two fruits to the pool and every swap sends a small fee to you.
list: You add in the correct pool ratio.
You can close your stand anytime.
modal.note: Note: In real Uniswap v4 you can use hooks and price ranges to optimize gains.

banner.title: Level 3: Token Creator - Launch a Token
banner.body: Use liquidity to launch your own token. Set the initial ratio (how many fruits per pesos) and let the market discover its price.
banner.concept: DeFi concept: Token Deployment + Initial Liquidity + Price Discovery

errors.missing: Fill all fields to plant your crop.
errors.balance: You don't have enough {{symbol}} to water your crop.

toasts.first: First token created! üéâ It now has initial liquidity and a price of {{price}} {{symbol}}.
toasts.created: {{name}} planted successfully! üå± Your garden is open.

labels.title: Mercado LP
labels.subtitle: Plant a crop
labels.subtitleHint: Create your fruit and open your garden.
labels.name: Fruit name
labels.tipBody: When planting you set the initial price. If you add more pesos than fruit, your token starts pricier.

modal.title: How to plant a crop?
modal.body1: As a farmer you create fruits (tokens) and open a garden (pool) so others can buy them.
list: Give your fruit a name and symbol
Choose which coin to pair it with (e.g. PESO)
Set how much you add on each side = initial price
Done, your garden is open and you earn fees
modal.note: The initial ratio defines price. If you add 100 GOLD and 50 PESO, then 1 GOLD = 0.5 PESO.

banner.title: Level 4: The Auctioneer
banner.body: Learn to distribute fruits with fair auctions. Everyone bids and the market decides the final price - you might pay less than you offered!

noAuction.title: No active auctions
noAuction.body: Start a new auction to learn how price discovery works.
noAuction.note: Note: You need at least one token created in Level 3

practiceMode.title: Practice Mode
practiceMode.description: Experiment without spending your real tokens
practiceMode.hint: Results won't affect your real inventory. Perfect for learning!

bidForm.title: Place your bid
bidForm.maxPriceHint: You'll only pay the clearing price, not necessarily your max.

maxPrice.title: What is max price?
maxPrice.body: It's the maximum you're willing to pay. If the clearing price is lower, you'll pay less!
maxPrice.tip: Example: If you bid $10 but the final price is $7, you only pay $7

spend.title: How much to spend?
spend.body: It's your budget for this round. It will be used to calculate how many tokens you can win.
spend.tip: If you spend $50 and the price is $5, you'd win 10 tokens

clearing.title: How Clearing Works
steps: Sorting bids from highest to lowest...
Done! See who won and how much they paid
clearing.savings: You bid ${{bid}} but only paid ${{paid}}. You saved ${{saved}}!
clearing.clearingWas: The clearing price was ${{price}}. Bid at least that to win!
clearing.placeBidNext: Place a bid in the next round to participate.

yourBids.title: Your active bids
yourBids.empty: No bids yet. Place your first bid above!

strategy.title: Auctioneer Strategy
strategy.tipBody: Bidding on early blocks usually gives you a better average price. Later blocks become more competitive and expensive. Distribute your budget intelligently across multiple blocks.

helpModal.title: What is a Continuous Clearing Auction (CCA)?
helpModal.intro: Continuous Clearing Auctions distribute tokens in blocks over time. This incentivizes early participation and fair price discovery.
helpModal.point1: Each block sells a portion of tokens
helpModal.point2: You set max price and total spend
helpModal.point3: When executed, you pay the clearing price (not your max)
helpModal.footer: Inspired by Uniswap v4 CCA hooks for fair token launches.

errors.missing: Fill max price and total spend.

toasts.firstBid: First bid placed! üéâ At round end, a single price will be calculated for everyone.
toasts.blockRun: Round {{block}} finished! Let's see the results...
toasts.reset: Auction reset. You can start a new one.

labels.title: Mercado LP
labels.subtitle: The Auctioneer
helpBody: 1. You make a bid: define the max you'd pay and how much to spend.
3. When the round closes, ONE single price is calculated for everyone.
4. If your bid is equal or higher than the single price, you win! And you pay the single price, not yours.
üí° Tip: Bid your real price. If you win, you might pay much less.

marketMaker.title: Market Maker Mode
marketMaker.lockedDesc: Reach Level 6 (4000 XP) to unlock advanced pool hooks and become a Market Maker.
marketMaker.createPoolDesc: Select tokens and an advanced hook for your pool

n5.name: Master
n5.title: Trading Leagues
n5.desc: Compete with other traders weekly. Climb the ranks and earn exclusive rewards!

n6.name: Legend
n6.title: Market Maker
n6.desc: Create pools with advanced hooks. Customize your strategy and maximize returns.

magicPot.title: The magic pot (x¬∑y=k)
magicPot.description: Move the slider: remove mangoes from the pot and watch the price rise.
magicPot.explanation: With fewer mangoes, each mango is "worth" more lemons. That's the x¬∑y=k formula in action.

slippage.title: Price impact (slippage)
slippage.description: If you buy a lot at once, you push the price up yourself. Adjust the mango purchase size:
slippage.tip: Tip: in the real market, whales split their orders to reduce impact.

liquidity.title: Liquidity and tips
liquidity.description: You put two fruits in the pot and earn a share of each tip. Your percentage defines how much tip you receive.
liquidity.point1: Deposit both fruits at the current ratio
liquidity.point2: Earn fees from each swap based on your share
liquidity.point3: If the price moves, your mix changes (IL)

createToken.title: Create your fruit and its market
createToken.description: Inventing fruit isn't enough: you must open its pot with initial liquidity. You set the starting price; then the market takes over.
createToken.point2: Pair it with another fruit and deposit both
createToken.point3: The initial deposit sets the starting price

quickTips.title: Quick tips
quickTips.tip1: Always check the impact before confirming
quickTips.tip2: Split large swaps into several smaller ones
quickTips.tip3: LP: choose ranges and hooks based on your risk
quickTips.tip4: Create token + pool; without a pot, nobody can buy
quickTips.more: More: v4.uniswap.org ¬∑ v4-core audits on GitHub

1.title: Do√±a Jose
1.subtitle: Challenge 1/4: Swaps
1.message: Hey there! I'm Do√±a Jose. Let's jump right into your first swap‚Äîstep by step, no drama.

2.title: Don Fede
2.subtitle: Challenge 2/4: Liquidity
2.message: Welcome! I'm Don Fede. You'll quickly learn how to provide liquidity and start earning fees.

3.title: Do√±a Mari
3.subtitle: Challenge 3/4: Create
3.message: Hi! I'm Do√±a Mari. I'll teach you how to create your own token and launch a pool in just a few steps.

4.title: Don Luis
4.subtitle: Challenge 4/4: Continuous Auctions (CCA)
4.message: Alright! I'm Don Luis. I'll teach you about continuous clearing auctions‚Äîfair token distribution by blocks. Bid early for better prices!
